name: Rolling Dice!
description:
A popular board game, A perfect map designed based on every stage of life. Every time you roll a dice, you have a chance to trigger a random event or get a reward, which is never boring.

If you are not satisfied with your life, come here to relieve your stress!
If you are satisfied with life, come here to magnify your happiness!

No need to think too much, Just have fun and win rewards!
